---
title: Contributing to the Course
order: 4
output-file: contribution
---

We welcome all forms of contribution. Here are some ways you can help:

- Contributing materials such as tutorials, guides, and examples.
- Translating the materials into new languages.
- Adapting the materials for different contexts or audiences.
- Peer review of the student assignments and projects.

Please visit our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/xcit-courses/missing/) to get started.
